keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject

byline.contributor: Nick Cumming-Bruce contributed reporting from Geneva, and Jim Yardley and Gaia Pianigiani from Catania, Sicily.

lead_paragraph: Experts said that the plans were far too small in scale and that they would not do enough to stem the flow of migrants or prevent disasters like a capsizing off Libya.

headline.print_headline: European Leaders Promise to Intensify Efforts on Migrants
headline.main: Europe’s Promised Action on Migration Crisis Is Criticized as Inadequate

snippet: Experts said that the plans were far too small in scale and that they would not do enough to stem the flow of migrants or prevent disasters like a capsizing off Libya.
abstract: European Union plans to triple budget on boarder protection in effort to stem increasing deaths of migrants, but leaders efforts are hindered by budget pressures and political backlash against immigrants.
